title: Activate Valet Mode
description: A customer is dropping their car at a valet and wants to enable 'Valet Mode' to restrict access to certain features and data.

tasks.description: Guide the customer to the 'Valet Mode' option in the vehicle's settings screen.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides clear instructions to find the feature.

tasks.description: Instruct the customer on how to set a temporary PIN for the mode.
Explain what Valet Mode does (e.g., locks the trunk and glove box, limits speed, hides personal data from the infotainment system).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the features and limitations of Valet Mode.
